de: Amendment No. 1 to the Supplemental Agreement between the Federal Department of Economic Affairs, Education and Research of Switzerland, acting through its State Secretariat for Economic Affairs and the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development and the International Development Association regarding the Debt Management Facility Phase II (DMF II) Multi-Donor Trust Fund (Trust Fund No. 072838 parallel to original Trust Fund No. 072132)  - 26-06-2019 - Abkommen zwischen der Schweiz, vertreten durch das SECO und der International Bank for Reconstruction and Development (IBRD) betreffend des Schweizer Beitrags für die zweite Phase der Debt Management Facility (DMF)
en: Amendment No. 1 to the Supplemental Agreement between the Federal Department of Economic Affairs, Education and Research of Switzerland, acting through its State Secretariat for Economic Affairs and the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development and the International Development Association regarding the Debt Management Facility Phase II (DMF II) Multi-Donor Trust Fund (Trust Fund No. 072838 parallel to original Trust Fund No. 072132)  - 26-06-2019 - Administration Agreement between the Federal Department of Economic Affairs, Education and Research of Switzerland, acting through its State Secretariat for Economic Affairs, and the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development and the International Development Association concerning the Debt Management Facility Phase II (DMF II) Multi-Donor Trust Fund (TF 072132)
fr: Amendment No. 1 to the Supplemental Agreement between the Federal Department of Economic Affairs, Education and Research of Switzerland, acting through its State Secretariat for Economic Affairs and the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development and the International Development Association regarding the Debt Management Facility Phase II (DMF II) Multi-Donor Trust Fund (Trust Fund No. 072838 parallel to original Trust Fund No. 072132)  - 26-06-2019 - Accord entre la Suisse, représentée par le SECO, et la Banque internationale pour la reconstruction et le développement (BIRD) concernant la contribution suisse pour la deuxième phase de la Debt Management Facility (DMF)
